Introduction.title: My name is Alejandro.
Introduction.text: And my passion is CREATING. Creating anything: furniture, stories, photographs, dishes, songs... But I get paid to create WEB APPS. So I create them. Because I'm good at it. Not just that. I put my whole SOUL into it. And this is how I live creating. And I'm happy. I wake up every single day with a smile.

PassionSection.smile: And you... what makes you smile?
PassionSection.dark1: Put your heart and soul into it, and let me help you with this.
PassionSection.dark2: I just need to know what genuinely inspires you.
PassionSection.quote: Inspiration exists, but it has to find you working

Inspiration.title: Inspiration
Inspiration.subtitle: So how can I help you?

Contact.text: Do you want to make your project come true?
Contact.title: Let's Talk

Introduction.title: I am Alejandro.
Introduction.text1: I graduated as a Telecommunications engineer, trained as a developer in startups, and established myself as a team leader in consulting.
Introduction.text2: Now I work as a freelancer from Asturias. Here I have found the peace and inspiration I need to create.
Introduction.text3: And I would love to put this energy at the service of your project.
